events.text:
Wow. I finally graduated! I'm free!
But now I have to find somewhere to live...
I would go for an apartment, but a house feels like a much better financial investment.
Besides, I can't afford the apartments with in-home laundry. And I always get hives from shared laundry machines.
Let's see what I can afford

Hey there! I hear you're looking for your [wave]forever[/wave] home?
That's great!
I've got a couple homes lined up for you to peruse. I'm hoping one of them is perfect for you.
If you'd indulge me, I enjoy doing this similar to the hit show on BGTV, "Residence Researchers".
Excellent. Then let's be on our way!

Well, on the hit show [wave]Residence Researchers[/wave], (Aired on BGTV), a couple works with their realtor to find three houses
They then list out each of the houses based on what different hopes and dreams they fulfill and the couple takes a break to decide which one they will go with.
Then, on the show, we follow up on them to see if it's everything they hoped it was.
However, since I'm your realtor and we don't have some kind of contractual clause allowing me to do that, there will be no follow up.
I like to do it this way because it helps avoid decision overload while also letting us live the dream of being on a TV show!

AHEM! Branding....
Anyway, I think I can assume you understand?
Allright. There's three houses I've got for you, let's start our tours!
